ygData.msgSnippet: The advice I ve been given is to save all of your points for later use with research, dodge, languages and specializations.  Right now I m lvl 12 with 57
ygData.messageBody:
The advice I've been given is to save all of your points for later use with research, dodge, languages and specializations. Right now I'm lvl 12 with 57 practice points saved, and all the skills I use are maxed out, you can get them up a lot easier by just buying a cheap spell that doesn't cost much mana and just casting like crazy until the skill is maxed.
----- Original Message -----
From: James
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Sent: Sunday, April 26, 1998 9:13 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] training points and spell research


I'm currently level 6 and have only used one of my training points to train in meditation. I assume that once I hit a certain level I'll realize what's lacking and then train alot in that, but any suggestions would be helpful. I was also saving up for spell research. Is spell research a skill that goes up quickly? Also, what does raising the spell research skill improve? All help is appreciated. Thanks, Lott.
